high_descs: Turn to the shelf on your left.
Pick up the box of tissues on the back, right corner of the shelf.
Turn around and go to the end table to the left of the couch.
Turn on the lamp that is on the end table, to the left of the couch.
anns.task_desc: Turn the lamp on the end table on.

high_descs: turn left to face the shelf that is under the TV
pick up the tissue box that is on the shelf
turn around, walk a few steps, turn left, walk towards the wall, turn right, walk to the table
anns.task_desc: examine a tissue box with a lamp

high_descs: Turn to your left to face the entertainment center.
Pick up the box of tissues from the entertainment center.
Turn right, walk until you reach the wall, then turn right and walk up to the end table.
Turn on the lamp that is sitting on the end table.
anns.task_desc: Inspect a box of tissues using the light of a lamp.
